name: Opportunity Knocks
description:
Control a Mars rover on a laggy transmission to collect Martian rocks on a journey of self discovery.

Made for Global Game Jam 2018 with theme "transmission".

IMPORTANT NOTE: Because this game requires pressing many keys at a time, it may not work on all computers/keyboards.

Opportunity Knocks by:
Dylan Gooley - Artist
Nicholas Robbins - Programmer
Matthew Roy - Programmer
Evan Janssen - Designer

This project was reuploaded from Game Jolt here: https://gamejolt.com/games/OpportunityKnocks/325797
